blogPost.excerpt: LiveChat newest integration with Mailchimp helps you get in touch with your website visitors by displaying an interactive greeting that allows them to sign up to your newsletter list.

blogPost.title: Mailchimp Newsletters widget by LiveChat - Get more newsletter signups from your website
blogPost.author: Agnieszka

previous.title:
Netflix is already in talks to make a movie about the events over the past week. 

So is Amazon. So is HBO. So is CBS. So is Hulu. So is USA. And AMC networks. And Disney. And Turner. And CSPAN.

localize.full_text:
Netflix已经在商讨拍摄一部关于过去一周事件的电影。

亚马逊也是。HBO也是。CBS也是 Hulu也是 美国电视台也是 和AMC网络。和迪斯尼。和特纳。和CSPAN。

Netflix已經在商討拍攝一部關於過去一週事件的電影。

亞馬遜也是。HBO也是。CBS也是 Hulu也是 美國電視臺也是 和AMC網絡。和迪斯尼。和特納。和CSPAN。

next.title:
I’m starting to think the bull market could last way longer than most ppl think

Robinhood just raised $3+ billion like it came out of thin air

There’s just so much $$$ sloshing around that if we don’t get a face-ripping melt up every correction will continue to be met w/buyers

localize.full_text:
我开始觉得牛市可能会比大多数人想象的持续时间更长

Robinhood刚融资30多亿美元，就像从天而降一样

有这么多的美元美元四处游荡，如果我们没有得到一个脸撕裂融化了，每一个修正将继续满足/买家

我開始覺得牛市可能會比大多數人想象的持續時間更長

Robinhood剛融資30多億美元，就像從天而降一樣

有這麼多的美元美元四處遊蕩，如果我們沒有得到一個臉撕裂融化了，每一個修正將繼續滿足/買家
